contentrichtext.text: '''John Acton''' is the name of: * [[John Acton (MP)]] for [[Droitwich (UK Parliament constituency)]] in 1597 * [[Sir John Acton, 6th Baronet]] (1736–1811), prime minister of Naples * [[John Dalberg-Acton, 1st Baron Acton]] (1834–1902), English historian * [[John Lyon-Dalberg-Acton, 3rd Baron Acton]] (1907–1989), British peer * [[John Lyon-Dalberg-Acton, 5th Baron Acton]] (born 1966), English writer and farmer * [[John Acton (canon lawyer)]] (died 1350), English canon lawyer, known for his commentary on the writer on the ecclesiastical ''Constitutions'' of two papal legates of the thirteenth century * [[John C. Acton]], United States Coast Guard rear admiral {{hndis|Acton, John}}
